name: Barcelona City Tour
description:
See all the major attractions of Barcelona and skip-the-line at Park Guell…!

This is the perfect tour if you wish to travel in comfort and style, and get a different and more in-depth perspective of the sights in Barcelona. We will not bore you with recycled or dry information but rather provide you with interesting anecdotes about the places we visit and life in Barcelona – you will not be disappointed!

*** NEW! If you want to visit the famous Park Guell (which is not to be missed if you’ve never been) then prepare for a very long queue at the entrance… or you can of course just book with us and smile as you walk pass the crowds with your skip-the-line tickets which we will arrange for you in advance…
